cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_integrity to an invalid enum value 'maybe' will cause security configuration parsing failure and connection issues.

du.explanation_en: Setting sib1_tda to 50 exceeds the valid range (typically 0-32) and will cause SIB1 timing advance configuration errors leading to broadcast failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 sib1_tda 設定為 50 超過有效範圍（通常為 0-32），會導致 SIB1 定時提前配置錯誤並造成廣播失敗。
